DrugName: Antibiotics like Ceftriaxone and Metronidazole to prevent infection due to stab wound and right rectus sheath hematoma
Anxiolytics such as Lorazepam for anxiety and depression symptoms
Anti-emetics like Ondansetron in case of nausea and vomiting
Hematostatic agents like Tranexamic Acid to control bleeding from the stab wound
